111751.start_text: Buoyant on the wind, a white crane flies.
111751.name: Above the Sky
111751.desc: Kuninotokotachi invited you to write couplets together.
result_text: Where horizons meet, the sunset sparkles in her eyes.
Soaring, haughty, but non the wise.

111752.start_text: A stroke of rainbow, comes upon a tranquil dream.
111752.name: A Fairyland
111752.desc: Ver sees the first half of a couplet and decides to get creative.
result_text: A galaxy of stars, flows along an endless stream.
The stars awaken somewhere in between.
I am awakened, by the greetings of the wind.

111753.start_text: Go with the new year and new friends that come with.
111753.name: Farewell to the Past
111753.desc: Surely Master will praise me if I get her a nice New Year's couplet!
result_text: Treat old foes and old grudges like no more than a myth.
Embrace your new days with their spring buds aplenty.
But forget not the places and faces of former times lived.

111754.start_text: New friends gather, like tides flooding from all directions.
111754.name: Streams of Spring
111754.desc: Looks like something is bothering Poseidon.
result_text: A spring brook flows, shining with its gentle reflections.
Directions one may look, good fortune will be discovered.
May inspirations strike, like lightning piercing the oceans.
